name: Proving Path
description:
Proving Path is a single-player 2D Metroidvania game using pixel art style.The player explores multiple areas according to the typical Metroidvania style, traversing back and forth through the map, finding secrets, and discovering new places again and again with newly acquired skills.

In Proving Path you play as Tabea, an adventurer who is on the road with her companions Leon and Finn. Together they explore new areas and find their way through the desert towards the jungle, where an old temple awaits them. They help each other on their journey to uncover the land's mysteries.

Features:

+ Full game experience with 2 to 3h playtime.
+ Metroidvania-like exploration, platforming, and fighting.
+ Adventure together with your partners, NPCs who aid you on your journey.
+ More than 70 handcrafted scenes of beautifully made pixel art.
+ 4 different areas with unique layouts and challenges.
+ 12 distinctive enemies and 2 boss fights.
+ Unique elemental abilities that aid you in exploration, combat, and puzzle.
